Management System (hereinafter - ISMS) is a subsystem of EPAM QMS which is presented by the set of EPAM regulations for systematic management of Company sensitive data.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Achieving information security requires management of risks from physical, Physical product design and development projects (including projects which are defined in the scope of QMS LSH).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Quality Policy and Information Security Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The key QMS documents are Quality Policy and Information Security Policy. These policies represent the commitments made by the top management with respect to quality and information security and provide a framework for setting quality objectives.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Quality Policy\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM has established, implemented, and maintains a Quality Management System (QMS) with the goal of continually achieving customer satisfaction by understanding and fulfilling the expectations and needs of our customers.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more about the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Corporate Governance Policies/Quality Policy.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Quality Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in EPAM Ethics and Compliance Library (ECL).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information Security Policy\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is dedicated to protecting all managed information assets by using its ISAE 3402 and ISO 27001:2013 compliant Information Security Management System to meet the information security challenges of our age, and to comply with laws and contractual obligations.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more about the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Corporate Governance Policies/Information Security Policy.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information Security Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in ECL.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why is QMS important for you? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Owing to adherence to QMS, you work in the Company and in a project according to the requirements known in advance. You can easily adapt yourself regardless of the previous   project you are involved in.\\nDocumented EPAM regulations allow solving issues using accumulated experience of the other teams. Project documentation helps to avoid keeping large amount of information in mind and to find necessary things rather quickly. You can fulfill project tasks, solve arising problems and plan your activities much easier; the level of misunderstanding and probability of miscommunication in a project and with the Customer decreases significantly, improving the emotional atmosphere in the team and in job satisfaction.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Successful functioning of ISMS is important to protect information assets, allowing the organization to:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) Achieve assurance that information assets are adequately protected against information security risks on a continual basis;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) Maintain a structured and comprehensive framework for identifying and assessing information security risks, selecting and applying applicable controls, and measuring and improving their effectiveness;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) Continually improve control environment;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) Effectively achieve legal and regulatory compliance\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Successful functioning of QMS LSH is important for both the Project and the Customer to ensure that medical device related services consistently meet customer and applicable regulatory requirements. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why do you need to know this? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To understand how EPAM operates; to know, where to find necessary information; and in case a customer asks you, “Do you have QMS?” you are able to answer confidently, \\\"Yes!\\\" In some instances, clients turn to other companies because they want assurance that their money will not be wasted. QMS is a set of interrelated elements that define the rules of the game.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why do we need to keep documentation?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The bigger the company – the harder it is to organize its operations and to manage all the projects.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In a small company formalized procedures are pointless: employees are able to discuss all the issues and make plans over a cup of coffee.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the number of people increases, informal communication becomes insufficient. As a result, necessary project information is difficult to obtain, deadlines are missed and product/service quality declines.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What if QMS is not established or ignored?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“Who submitted this bug?!” – Unknown.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A lot of time is spent on reworking functionality that has already been implemented, this is because the process is not traceable. The building of a product turns into an uncontrolled process when code is not under version control.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to avoid such problems, it is important for a global company to establish corporate management system.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Therefore, EPAM QMS is indispensable.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions about this section, please contact your Manager or contact us through\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do?orderitem=caQMSSupportRequestsTrainingSupportRequest#complete\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"QMS Training Support\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
